1. Emergency Contact Numbers

Emergency Contact Numbers
=========================

* For non-emergency, call 512-974-0845 ext. 3 ~or~ call 311.
* To contact the West Lake Hills PD Administrative Office, call 512-327-1195. If calling after-hours, you may leave a message and staff will respond the next business day.

* Water District #10 for Water Information and to Report Outages - Phone 512-327-2230 - After Hours 512-246-1400 -
  [Online website](https://www.waterdistrict10.org/)
  .
* For EMERGENCY, call Crossroads Utility at 512-246-1400.

* Contact AUSTIN ENERGY for Electricity information.
* To report outages, trees in power lines, and damaged electrical poles - phone 512-322-9100 or 311 -
  [Report Online](https://austinenergy.com/outages)
  .

Leave the area immediately and then call 911 and 800-959-5325.

* For non-emergency, call 512-539-3400 or by
  [Email](mailto:info@WestlakeFD.org)
  .

If you lose power during a storm, please contact your local utility company for updates. Once power is restored and conditions are safe, Spectrum technicians will resolve any service issues.

[Spectrum Storm Center](https://www.spectrumbusiness.net/page/spectrum-business-storm-center)
[Spectrum Storm Prep](https://www.spectrumbusiness.net/support/general/spectrum-business-storm-preparation)
[Find one near you](https://www.spectrum.com/internet/wifi-access-points?opredirect=wifi-hotspots%3Fopredirect%3Dwifi-access-points%3Fopredirect%3Dwifi-hotspots&opredirect=wifi-hotspots)

CITY CODE VIOLATIONS
--------------------

Reporting of illicit discharging or other city code violations within the City online or call 512-327-3628.

* For gas, electric and telecom - Call 811 on your phone
* For water and sewer - Contact Crossroads
  + Phone: (512) 246-1400
